trans-unit.source: Provides a collection of methods for allocating unmanaged memory and copying unmanaged memory blocks.
trans-unit.target: 提供配置 Unmanaged 記憶體和複製 Unmanaged 記憶體區塊的方法集合。

trans-unit.source: The managed object to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的 Managed 物件。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of a managed <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> object to a block of memory allocated from the unmanaged COM task allocator.
trans-unit.target: 將 Managed <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> 物件的內容複製到從 Unmanaged COM 工作配置器配置的記憶體區塊。

trans-unit.source: The address, in unmanaged memory, where the <paramref name="s" /> parameter was copied to, or 0 if a null object was supplied.
trans-unit.target: Unmanaged 記憶體中複製 <paramref name="s" /> 參數的目的位址；如果提供 Null 物件，則為 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.SecureStringMarshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemAnsi%2A> method is useful for custom marshaling or when mixing managed and unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.SecureStringMarshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemAnsi%2A>方法可用於自訂封送處理，或當混合 managed 和 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Because this method allocates the unmanaged memory required for a string, always free the memory by calling <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ZeroFreeCoTaskMemAnsi%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個方法配置 unmanaged 的記憶體所需的字串，一律以釋放記憶體呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ZeroFreeCoTaskMemAnsi%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The characters of the string are copied as ANSI characters.
trans-unit.target: 字串的字元複製為 ANSI 字元。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="s" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current computer is not running Windows 2000 Service Pack 3 or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的電腦未執行 Windows 2000 Service Pack 3 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: There is insufficient memory available.
trans-unit.target: 可用的記憶體不足。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This method is supported only on computers running Windows 2000 Service Pack 3 or later.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是執行 Windows 2000 Service Pack 3 的電腦上才支援或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: The managed object to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的 Managed 物件。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of a managed <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> object to a block of memory allocated from the unmanaged COM task allocator.
trans-unit.target: 將 Managed <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> 物件的內容複製到從 Unmanaged COM 工作配置器配置的記憶體區塊。

trans-unit.source: The address, in unmanaged memory, where the <paramref name="s" /> parameter was copied to, or 0 if a null object was supplied.
trans-unit.target: Unmanaged 記憶體中複製 <paramref name="s" /> 參數的目的位址；如果提供 Null 物件，則為 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.SecureStringMarshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemUnicode%2A> method is useful for custom marshaling or when mixing managed and unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.SecureStringMarshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemUnicode%2A>方法可用於自訂封送處理，或當混合 managed 和 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Because this method allocates the unmanaged memory required for a string, always free the memory by calling the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ZeroFreeCoTaskMemUnicode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個方法配置 unmanaged 的記憶體所需的字串，一律以釋放記憶體呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ZeroFreeCoTaskMemUnicode%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The characters of the string are copied as Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 字串的字元複製為 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="s" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current computer is not running Windows 2000 Service Pack 3 or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的電腦未執行 Windows 2000 Service Pack 3 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: There is insufficient memory available.
trans-unit.target: 可用的記憶體不足。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This method is supported only on computers running Windows 2000 Service Pack 3 or later.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是執行 Windows 2000 Service Pack 3 的電腦上才支援或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: The managed object to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的 Managed 物件。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of a managed <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> into unmanaged memory, converting into ANSI format as it copies.
trans-unit.target: 將 Managed <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> 的內容複製到 Unmanaged 記憶體中，並在它複製時轉換成 ANSI 格式。

trans-unit.source: The address, in unmanaged memory, to where the <paramref name="s" /> parameter was copied, or 0 if a null object was supplied.
trans-unit.target: Unmanaged 記憶體中複製 <paramref name="s" /> 參數的目標位址；如果提供 Null 物件，則為 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.SecureStringMarshal.SecureStringToGlobalAllocAnsi%2A> method is useful for custom marshaling or when mixing managed and unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.SecureStringMarshal.SecureStringToGlobalAllocAnsi%2A>方法可用於自訂封送處理，或當混合 managed 和 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Because this method allocates the unmanaged memory required for a string, always free the memory by calling the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ZeroFreeGlobalAllocAnsi%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個方法配置 unmanaged 的記憶體所需的字串，一律以釋放記憶體呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ZeroFreeGlobalAllocAnsi%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="s" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current computer is not running Windows 2000 Service Pack 3 or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的電腦未執行 Windows 2000 Service Pack 3 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: There is insufficient memory available.
trans-unit.target: 可用的記憶體不足。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This method is supported only on computers running Windows 2000 Service Pack 3 or later.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是執行 Windows 2000 Service Pack 3 的電腦上才支援或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: The managed object to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的 Managed 物件。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of a managed <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> object into unmanaged memory.
trans-unit.target: 將 Managed <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> 物件的內容複製到 Unmanaged 記憶體中。

trans-unit.source: The address, in unmanaged memory, where <paramref name="s" /> was copied, or 0 if <paramref name="s" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> object whose length is 0.
trans-unit.target: Unmanaged 記憶體中複製 <paramref name="s" /> 的目標位址；如果 <paramref name="s" /> 是長度為 0 的 <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> 物件，則為 0。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="s" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current computer is not running Windows 2000 Service Pack 3 or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的電腦未執行 Windows 2000 Service Pack 3 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: There is insufficient memory available.
trans-unit.target: 可用的記憶體不足。
